Great, inventive puzzles. Lots of fun.

Portal 2 is great, doing an exellent job at building off of the first, with amazing humor, and visuals that still work, and a mechanic ingenious in it's use. If you have not played this game as well as its original than both are worth your time and 15 dollars. 
So yeah Wheatley is as great as Glados... Maybe? No matter, the puzzles are still amazing, Chell as well written as she was in the last title, and the Turrets as bleak.  If you want deep dramatics though? Nah go to Sony for that much, this game is just more of the last, so basically the only reason, for me, that it's better is because it's longer. SO PLAY IT!

Como eu descrevo isso? Tantas memorias.Tantas emoções.
Fui apresentado a Portal 1 quando tinha 5 anos ,adoro a franquia desde então.
Portal 2 e melhor jogo da década passada,tudo se encaixa perfeitamente, os puzzles são bem construídos e a historia e...e...a melhor,mesmo tendo poucos personagens ela te envolve num mundo expansivo e cheio de segredos e detalhes telegrafados de forma nada obvia,mas que quando descobertos te deixam com ainda mais perguntas(não que isso seja uma coisa ruim).
E toda a comunidade também e de dar inveja com os compositores,artistas e ate desenvolvedores(já vou falar mais deles) que te cativam a perseverar mesmo na fase mais difícil.
Recomendo a todos os leitores a comprar todos os jogos da Valve (exceto artifact) pois todos são baratos e podem rodar ate numa batata(literalmente).
Também recomendo checarem Portal Stories:Mel pois foi feito por fans e de extrema qualidade(e de graça!) sem falar de todas as musicas e animações.
Sinceramente compre esse jogo mesmo que seja pela terceira vez(que pena tenham pessoas que não tenham condições de contar ate trés).

This is  a great game.  Very inventive, entertaining, challenging and funny too.  Voice acting is top notch. The Farmer's Insurance guy and Ricky Gervais's sidekick make the game so much better.  I would strongly recommend playing Portal first even  though portal 2 is superior. However you learn how to use the Portal gun in Portal and that saves you a world of getting up to speed for Portal 2. 
The game has a steep learning curve but don't get discouraged. Ir you get completely stuck, there are video walk-throughs to help you out on You-Tube.  I found these to be necessary in the beginning but after a while you start to get the hang of the various devices used. It is evident the developers put a ton of work into these games. I would hope to see a Portal 3. Overall one of the best and definitely the most inventive game I have played to date.
I have not played as long as other people, but I feel like it is a good game and has stood the test of time. Good game 8/10.

...zajebiste 10/10

This and the first Portal game were introduced to me when I was much younger, and despite playing many games, I've never experienced a mechanic quite like it in any other. Portal 2 offers a much more intriguing story-driven plot, as well as providing some insight into the game's lore. Not only that, but the puzzles are much more challenging, as well. With new elements and new environments introduced, it forces you to think in different ways, all while thinking with portals. It's an amazing game, and I definitely recommend it to anyone wondering if they should play it.

Мне очень понравилась вторая часть, она гораздо более насыщена событиями и дает ответы на вопросы, что возникли после прохождения первой части. В ней создатели не только сделали больше головоломок, но и разнообразили их, не говоря уже о их сложности. Теперь головоломка не концентрируется строго в одном помещении, но может являться ключом к следующему пункту назначения. 
Особенно порадовало, раскрытие личности ГЛаДОС, истории комплекса, личности героини и человека, что оставлял надписи на стенах и повлиял на судьбу Челл (читайте комикс).

Amazingly polished and fun to play and co-op adds even more fun. More puzzle elements than the original Portal makes it more difficult but observing the chamber properly is definitely necessary. Should definitely try it out with amazing storyline and comical sense crated by Stephen Merchant is just an icing on the cake. Worth every penny and should definitely try it out. Graphics are great and the physics is the most accurate I have ever seen in a game this old(2011).

このゲームは前作の続編となっていますのでそちらからのプレイをお勧めします。
キャラクターの個性もしっかりとあり、世界観、ゲームの舞台、グラフィック、ストーリーを始めとして、バックストーリー、カメラワークなども非常に精巧に作られており、プレイヤーはPortalの世界にどっぷりと入り込むことができます。（実際に、解説モードで開発者の解説が聴けますが、かなり精巧に作りこまれていることがわかります。）有名なRPGゲームにも負けないような完成度だと思います。
今作ではステージ作成ツールが含まれており、自分でステージを作り、それを他のプレイヤーに公開したり、逆に他のプレイヤーが作成したステージを遊ぶことができます。また、マルチプレイもあり、2人でマルチプレイ専用ステージを遊ぶことができます。
たまにセールこのゲームと前作のPortalのバンドルが超格安で売られていることがあります。（私も90円で買いました。）このジャンルに興味がなくても、購入を強くお勧めできる作品です。
